snippet.title: Histories | Game Trailer | PC Browser
snippet.description:
Play as the scholar ANKHESENAMUN that has taken on the daunting task of following the footsteps of the great Historian HERODOTUS.


Explore the realms unknown to humans and meet the most surreal life forms, while our adventurous scholar uncovers the secrets of these fascinating realms...


Shout out to Cult Balm Productions for this trailer
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCANrR6Q2RxtftuhZtcb-7vw


Play on Itch.io 
 https://ankhesenamun26.itch.io/ankhesenamuns-histories

Follow on Twitter
 https://twitter.com/Ankhesenamun26


#gamedev #indiegame #interactivefiction
